author: bobka
post_text: March 16, 2015 at 2:57 PM#1Can someone good at macros give me a hand?. I want to make a macro that copies an armed template effect with the current selection at the end of the effect pool and renames it to"name of group + name of template effect" - just like ma1 did.

title: Effect macro simulating ma1
